The captain of the guard leads a troop of soldiers who serve as security forces for a powerful individual, most often a high-ranking noble or very rich merchant, though this stat block could also represent a lower-ranking captain of the guard for the leader of a nation. A formidable opponent in their own right, the captain of the guard skillfully employs their troops to protect the life and health of their ward. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 22 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 [Captain of the Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3560) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 115 **Perception** +15 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +13, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +12, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +10, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +8 **Str** +5 **Dex** +0 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +3 **Items** [Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13), _+1 [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=386)_, [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 24 (26 with shield raised) **Fort** +14 **Ref** +12 **Will** +15 **HP** 95 **Aura of Command** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) 30 feet. The captain of the guard bolsters lower-level guards under their command, granting them a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to their Will saves.
**Bravery** When the captain rolls a success on a Will save against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598) effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) condition, reduce its value by 1.
**Shield Warden** When the captain has their shield raised, they can [Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=75) when an attack is made against an adjacent ally. If they do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of the captain.
**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=75)** --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _longsword_ +18 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+11 slashing **Melee** fist +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4+11 bludgeoning **Ranged** crossbow +12 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d8+6 piercing **Shielded Advance** **Requirements** The captain of the guard has their shield raised; **Effect** The captain of the guard presses forward, using their shield to push back foes. The captain Strides and [Shoves](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380), in either order. The multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Shove, though the Shove does count toward the captain's multiple attack penalty.
